---
title: "Department of Social Services"
---

The Department of Social Services provides a litany of human services to Hopetopians in need and generally administers federal, state, and city welfare and protection services. The department headquarters is located in Town Hall in the center of the city and houses the leadership and central administration of the Adult Human Services and Youth Social Services departments. Both departments operate offices and programs in various parts throughout the city - from shelters to mental health centers to substance treatment centers. The department sites provide more details about each departments recent news and current operations.
